page.title: 20SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: In Albrighton the technology is quite amazing for a small village.Here are the technical things we found. Tills 23 Jigsaws 2 Scales 10 Lawnmowers 2 Telefax 1 Key cutters 2 Plessey 1 Child's ride 1 Microfiche 1 Record player 1 Cameras 2 Phone card 1 Photo copiers 2 Petrol pumps 7 Intercom 1 Brake tester 1 Clocks 3 Light up sign 1 P.A system 1 Heating timer 1 Burglar alarms 9 Strimmer 1 Ebos system 1 Oscilloscope 1 Eye tester 1 Paint mixer 1 Calculators 6 Lighting timers 2 Micro waves 3 Radios 3 Video 1 Televisions 2 Computers 2 Stereo 1 Watch timer 1 Grinders 1 Drills 3 Watch cleaner 1
